thing-type.label: HomeWizard P1 Meter
thing-type.description: This thing provides the measurement data that is available through the API of a HomeWizard P1 Meter.

channel.label: Active Power L1
channel.description: This channel provides the active usage for phase 1 in Watt.

channel.label: Active Power L2
channel.description: This channel provides the active usage for phase 2 in Watt.

channel.label: Active Power L3
channel.description: This channel provides the active usage for phase 3 in Watt.

channel.label: Active Voltage L1
channel.description: This channel provides the active voltage for phase 1 in Volt.

channel.label: Active Voltage L2
channel.description: This channel provides the active voltage for phase 2 in Volt.

channel.label: Active Voltage L3
channel.description: This channel provides the active voltage for phase 3 in Volt.

channel.label: Active Current L1
channel.description: This channel provides the active current for phase 1 in Ampere.

channel.label: Active Current L2
channel.description: This channel provides the active current for phase 2 in Ampere.

channel.label: Active Current L3
channel.description: This channel provides the active current for phase 3 in Ampere.

channel.label: Energy Import T1
channel.description: This channel provides the energy usage meter reading for tariff 1 in kWh.

channel.label: Energy Import T2
channel.description: This channel provides the energy usage meter reading for tariff 2 in kWh.

channel.label: Energy Export T1
channel.description: This channel provides the energy feed-in meter reading for tariff 1 in kWh.

channel.label: Energy Export T2
channel.description: This channel provides the energy feed-in meter reading for tarff 2 in kWh.

channel.label: Long Power Failures
channel.description: This channel provides the number of 'long' power failures detected by meter.

channel-type.label: Power Failures
channel-type.description: This channel provides the number of power failures detected by meter.

channel-type.label: Total Imported Gas
channel-type.description: This channel provides the most recently reported total imported gas in m^3. It does not get updated as frequently as the data in the other channels, the gas_timestamp channel provides the time stamp of the most recent update.

channel-type.label: Gas Update Time Stamp
channel-type.description: This channel provides the time stamp of the total_gas measurement.
